parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the shape of a location to be either rectangular or elliptical. Locations default shape is elliptical.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> location '''setRectangular''' set

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> set: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] set rectangular, [[false]] set elliptical

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLocation [[setRectangular]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setText]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearestLocations]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[createLocation]], [[rectangular]]
</value></part></template>
